finalWarning:
Are you sure?
This cannot be undone
warningClass:
Are you sure?
Experimental classes will contains bugs, don't forget that you can restart a level with R
credits: Made by Xwilarg for the TF2Maps 72-Hour Summer Jam
tutorial1-2: Use left click to shoot underneath you!
tutorial2-2: Try to jump right before shooting!
tutorial2-3: Train yourself at finding a nice angle and cross this cliff!
tutorial3-1: Capture all control points to win!
tutorial4-1: Loosing too much speed when landing?
tutorial4-2: While you are rocket jumping shoot towards the floor and try to time your rocket so it explodes right before touch the ground
tutorial5-1: You can use the techniques learnt before to walljump
tutorial5-2: Want to retry quickly? Press R
tutorial6-1: Wall is too high? Propulse yourself upward
tutorial6-2: And while in the air, shoot a another rocket downward so it explodes right before you touch the ground, giving you more vertical velocity
